title: Sync selected opportunity symbol across Market Turn Monitor and 3m Checklist tabs

requirements.text: Create a single shared "selected trading pair" state for the Dashboard tabs so that changing the symbol in any one of these places updates the others automatically: (1) the selected opportunity in the Opportunity Recognition (Oportunidades) tab, (2) the Market tab (including Market Turn Monitor), and (3) the Checklist tab (3m checklist).

quotes: ao selecionar esse ativo .. ele deve automaticamente ser selecionado .. nas abas market turn monitor e 3 min checklist

acceptanceCriteria: When a user selects a symbol in Opportunity Recognition, the Market tab selector value updates to that symbol and MarketTrendMonitor renders using that symbol.
When a user selects a symbol in Opportunity Recognition, the Checklist tab selector value updates to that symbol and ChecklistSignalsPanel3m renders using that symbol.
When a user changes the symbol using the selector in the Market tab, the Checklist tab uses the same symbol (and vice versa).
The shared symbol defaults to "BTCUSDT" on first load (matching current behavior).

requirements.text: Update OpportunityRecognitionPanel to expose a symbol-selection callback so that selecting an opportunity symbol triggers the shared Dashboard symbol update (without requiring the user to manually re-select the symbol in other tabs).

quotes: ao selecionar um par de trade na area de oportunidades.. ... ao selecionar esse ativo .. ele deve automaticamente ser selecionado .. nas abas market turn monitor e 3 min checklist

acceptanceCriteria: OpportunityRecognitionPanel accepts a prop (e.g., onSelectSymbol(symbol: string)) that is called with the clicked opportunity rowâ€™s symbol.
Clicking an opportunity row still opens the details dialog as it does today, and also updates the shared Dashboard symbol state to the clicked symbol.

constraints: Do not edit files under frontend/src/components/ui (compose existing UI components instead).
Do not modify any immutable frontend paths listed in SYSTEM_CONTEXT (e.g., frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts(x), frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx).
nonGoals: Do not add new backend APIs or persist the selected symbol to the backend.
Do not change the ranking/scoring logic for opportunities.
Do not introduce new tabs or navigation flows (e.g., auto-switching tabs) unless required for the symbol sync.
